options.help: IPv4 mode.
options.name: ipv4

options.help: IPv6 mode.
options.name: ipv6

bandwidth-weight.help: Coefficient of reciprocal of available bidirectional bandwidth in the formula of custom-profile-1.
bandwidth-weight.name: bandwidth-weight

default.help: Enable/disable use of SD-WAN as default service.
default.name: default

options.help: Enable use of SD-WAN as default service.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable use of SD-WAN as default service.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable use of forward DSCP tag.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable use of forward DSCP tag.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable use of reverse DSCP tag.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable use of reverse DSCP tag.
options.name: disable

dst-negate.help: Enable/disable negation of destination address match.
dst-negate.name: dst-negate

options.help: Enable destination address negation.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable destination address negation.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable SD-WAN service gateway.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable SD-WAN service gateway.
options.name: disable

hash-mode.help: Hash algorithm for selected priority members for load balance mode.
hash-mode.name: hash-mode

options.help: All traffic are distributed to selected interfaces in equal portions and circular order.
options.name: round-robin

options.help: All traffic from a source IP is sent to the same interface.
options.name: source-ip-based

options.help: All traffic from a source IP to a destination IP is sent to the same interface.
options.name: source-dest-ip-based

options.help: All traffic are distributed to a selected interface with most available bandwidth for incoming traffic.
options.name: inbandwidth

options.help: All traffic are distributed to a selected interface with most available bandwidth for outgoing traffic.
options.name: outbandwidth

options.help: All traffic are distributed to a selected interface with most available bandwidth for both incoming and outgoing traffic.
options.name: bibandwidth

hold-down-time.help: Waiting period in seconds when switching from the back-up member to the primary member (0 - 10000000, default = 0).
hold-down-time.name: hold-down-time

input-device-negate.help: Enable/disable negation of input device match.
input-device-negate.name: input-device-negate

options.help: Enable negation of input device match.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable negation of input device match.
options.name: disable

internet-service.help: Enable/disable use of Internet service for application-based load balancing.
internet-service.name: internet-service

options.help: Enable cloud service to support application-based load balancing.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable cloud service to support application-based load balancing.
options.name: disable

id.help: Application control based Internet Service ID.
id.name: id

internet-service-app-ctrl.help: Application control based Internet Service ID list.
internet-service-app-ctrl.name: internet-service-app-ctrl

name.help: Application control based Internet Service group name.
name.name: name

internet-service-app-ctrl-group.help: Application control based Internet Service group list.
internet-service-app-ctrl-group.name: internet-service-app-ctrl-group

jitter-weight.help: Coefficient of jitter in the formula of custom-profile-1.
jitter-weight.name: jitter-weight

latency-weight.help: Coefficient of latency in the formula of custom-profile-1.
latency-weight.name: latency-weight

options.help: Select link based on latency.
options.name: latency

options.help: Select link based on jitter.
options.name: jitter

options.help: Select link based on packet loss.
options.name: packet-loss

options.help: Select link based on available bandwidth of incoming traffic.
options.name: inbandwidth

options.help: Select link based on available bandwidth of outgoing traffic.
options.name: outbandwidth

options.help: Select link based on available bandwidth of bidirectional traffic.
options.name: bibandwidth

options.help: Select link based on customized profile.
options.name: custom-profile-1

link-cost-threshold.help: Percentage threshold change of link cost values that will result in policy route regeneration (0 - 10000000, default = 10).
link-cost-threshold.name: link-cost-threshold

minimum-sla-meet-members.help: Minimum number of members which meet SLA.
minimum-sla-meet-members.name: minimum-sla-meet-members

mode.help: Control how the SD-WAN rule sets the priority of interfaces in the SD-WAN.
mode.name: mode

options.help: Assign interfaces a priority based on quality.
options.name: auto

options.help: Assign interfaces a priority manually.
options.name: manual

options.help: Assign interfaces a priority based on the link-cost-factor quality of the interface.
options.name: priority

options.help: Assign interfaces a priority based on selected SLA settings.
options.name: sla

options.help: Distribute traffic among all available links based on round robin. ADVPN feature is not supported in the mode.
options.name: load-balance

packet-loss-weight.help: Coefficient of packet-loss in the formula of custom-profile-1.
packet-loss-weight.name: packet-loss-weight

passive-measurement.help: Enable/disable passive measurement based on the service criteria.
passive-measurement.name: passive-measurement

options.help: Enable passive measurement of user traffic.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable passive measurement of user traffic.
options.name: disable

role.help: Service role to work with neighbor.
role.name: role

options.help: Standalone service.
options.name: standalone

options.help: Primary service for primary neighbor.
options.name: primary

options.help: Secondary service for secondary neighbor.
options.name: secondary

sla-compare-method.help: Method to compare SLA value for SLA mode.
sla-compare-method.name: sla-compare-method

options.help: Compare SLA value based on the order of health-check.
options.name: order

options.help: Compare SLA value based on the number of satisfied health-check.  Limits health-checks to only configured member interfaces.
options.name: number

src-negate.help: Enable/disable negation of source address match.
src-negate.name: src-negate

options.help: Enable source address negation.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable source address negation.
options.name: disable

standalone-action.help: Enable/disable service when selected neighbor role is standalone while service role is not standalone.
standalone-action.name: standalone-action

options.help: Enable service when selected neighbor role is standalone.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable service when selected neighbor role is standalone.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable SD-WAN service.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable SD-WAN service.
options.name: disable

tie-break.help: Method of selecting member if more than one meets the SLA.
tie-break.name: tie-break

options.help: Use the setting that is configured for the members' zone.
options.name: zone

options.help: Members that meet the SLA are selected in the order they are configured.
options.name: cfg-order

options.help: Members that meet the SLA are selected that match the longest prefix in the routing table.
options.name: fib-best-match

use-shortcut-sla.help: Enable/disable use of ADVPN shortcut for quality comparison.
use-shortcut-sla.name: use-shortcut-sla

options.help: Enable use of ADVPN shortcut for quality comparison.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable use of ADVPN shortcut for quality comparison.
options.name: disable

results.help: Create SD-WAN rules (also called services) to control how sessions are distributed to interfaces in the SD-WAN.
results.name: service
